body: This is weird af no lie

Wow somehow I never noticed the newer comments! I don't have social media or anything for my work - it's just a hobby haha. User-san, yeah I notice those mistranslations too, now, that I'm looking back at them. The RAWs should be elsewhere on this site I'd imagine though kind of late for a change now xD I was still learning Japanese when writing these and using them as practice. If there was a phrase, such as 下付き which I wouldnt be sure of, I may have minorly re-written some lines to still convey the same ideas but not be a 1:1 translation :p
How is this cursed but wholesome at the same time
@Artfish Actually I notice a lot of inaccuracies, but maybe you were purposefully rewriting the story?

@Artfish could you release decensored RAW (untranslated) version? I notice on page 4 you mis-translate the top-left panel. Right girl says to left girl 'Ayumi, (your vagina) is lower down, so it is (better) if you shoot from behind'. That is she should pee backwards. See https://www.excite.co.jp/news/article/Joshispa_20160903_00576904/ for explanation on 下付き. You may have mis-translations elsewhere but I do no bother to look.
does artfish have a site or any social media accounts i could follow?
Artfish is a friggin legend
chika you bitch
@artfish do you have plans to translate chapters 3 and 4?  I'm excited to actually understand what is said in those chapters!
@artfish You are Insane! Keep it up!
To clarify, I am releasing each chapter from that RAW separately, but I will release them all in one gallery when I have them all done under the title of that anthology.

@Twizo That's actually what I am doing haha xD I'm using that as the RAW because of the quality but also because I noticed most chapters haven't been translated yet. I am almost done with the 3rd museum chapter, will likely have it up sunday or monday. The sports festival series I have partially translated and only minimally decensored...so it will take some more time. Trying to do at least 1 chapter a week! :D

@artfish translate this pls!
